main_text.sentence: The literature from English-speaking countries indicates that teaching communication skills is effective in improving learners' communication skills with patients [1].
To guide the teaching of communication skills, we created a conceptual model for patient-physician communication referring to 3 existing models [2,10,11].
Citizens increasingly use email in personal communication [1].
However, besides skills in communication [21,24,25], this requires time.
Spirituality/positivity has also been related to communication outcomes [26].
